admin_sticker.name_tooltip:
Name
Make sure that you insert right name. Do not use white-space and special characters except hypen(-) and undersocre(_)
admin_sticker.priority_tooltip:
Priority
0 is most important and the number getting bigger than will get less importance. 0 will be shown on the first list.
admin_sticker.tags_tooltip:
Tag - Sub filter
Seperate using comma(,) and do not use any special characters. ex) Blue, Snack, Cookie
